data.englishTranslation: May Allah replace it when it is worn out.
Put on new clothes, live a praise-worthy life and die as a martyr.
data.transliteration: Ilbas jadeedan, wa 'ish hameedan, wa mut shaheedan.
data.arabicVerse: اِلْبَـسْ جَدِيـداً وَعِـشْ حَمِـيداً وَمُـتْ شَهِيداً
data.reference: [Hisnul 8] [Ibn Majah 2/1178, Al-Baghawi 12/41, Al-Albani, Sahih Ibn Majah 2/275]
